    • Constructor Detail

      • Builder

        public Builder​(DNSResolver resolver,
               java.net.InetAddress clientIP,
               java.lang.String heloHost)
        Creates a new builder.
        Parameters:
        resolver - the DNS resolver to use for lookups
        clientIP - the IP address of the connecting client
        heloHost - the HELO/EHLO hostname from the client

    • Method Detail

      • onSPF

        public AuthPipeline.Builder onSPF​(SPFCallback callback)
        Registers a callback for SPF results.

        The callback will be invoked during MAIL FROM processing, as soon as the SPF check completes.

        Parameters:
        callback - the SPF result callback
        Returns:
        this builder

      • onDKIM

        public AuthPipeline.Builder onDKIM​(DKIMCallback callback)
        Registers a callback for DKIM results.

        The callback will be invoked at end-of-data, after the DKIM signature has been verified.

        Parameters:
        callback - the DKIM result callback
        Returns:
        this builder

      • onDMARC

        public AuthPipeline.Builder onDMARC​(DMARCCallback callback)
        Registers a callback for DMARC results.

        The callback will be invoked at end-of-data, after both SPF and DKIM results are available.

        Parameters:
        callback - the DMARC result callback
        Returns:
        this builder

      • messageHandler

        public AuthPipeline.Builder messageHandler​(MessageHandler handler)
        Registers a message handler to receive parsed message events.

        The raw message bytes will be parsed and events forwarded to this handler.

        Parameters:
        handler - the message handler to receive parsed events
        Returns:
        this builder

      • build

        public AuthPipeline build()
        Builds the AuthPipeline.
        Returns:
        the configured pipeline
